title: How to add specific site under trusted sites
body: In IE, we have trusted sites option where we can add specific site under trusted sites. on Edge browser, This feature is missing. How can we add  specific site under trusted sites?

comments.body: Our business is less likely to use Edge without trusted sites. Back to Chrome or Firefox... I'm trying to connect to content on SharePoint and Chrome/Firefox are better options... what is the deal with that?
Bump.. Still no fix to add trusted site?
Why would there be a solution to this, it's only been 2 years.  And control panel - Internet Optoins isn't an answer, Edge isn't picking those settings up.
Was there a solution to this?
